entity.name: content
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('biblio-',finds.id) AS identifier, finds.old_findID, objecttype, broadperiod, finds.id, findspots.county, publications.title, publications.authors, slides.filename AS filename, users.imagedir AS imagedir, slides.imageID AS thumbnail, publications.id AS pubID, finds.secwfstage AS workflow FROM bibliography LEFT JOIN finds ON finds.secuid = bibliography.findID LEFT JOIN publications ON publications.secuid = bibliography.pubID LEFT JOIN findspots ON finds.secuid = findspots.findID LEFT JOIN finds_images ON finds_images.find_id = finds.secuid LEFT JOIN slides ON finds_images.image_id = slides.secuid LEFT JOIN users ON users.id = finds.createdBy WHERE finds.id IS NOT NULL
